text: "Mona Lisas and Mad Hatters" is a 1972 song by Elton John. It is the ninth track from his fifth studio album Honky Ch√¢teau. The song was later used as the B-side to his 1980 single Harmony. In 1988 a sequel was made under the title Mona Lisas and Mad Hatters (Part Two). ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Elton John songs
title: Mona Lisas and Mad Hatters
